main event: On December 9, 1963, two observers reported sighting an unknown flying object near Philadelphia, Pa.
interesting points: The object was described as triangular in shape and approximately 30 feet in length., It emitted a bluish-white glow., The sighting occurred at an estimated altitude of 500 feet., The observers reported no sound associated with the sighting., The object was observed for about 2 minutes before disappearing.
